name: Ninja Slicer
description:
A game made for The GameMaker's Toolkit Jam for 2019 #GMTKJam.

Your village has been overrun by the undead and a couple of bats. Save everyone (including your in-laws).

(if playing on Browser, enable Full Screen)

HOW TO PLAY (Available in-game as well)

  • Left Mouse Button to jump in the direction of the kunai (the pointer thingy)
  • Avoid spikes and the undead... and a couple of bats
  • Hit M to mute music

Post a link to your game play, would love to see what score you get.

Goodluck!!!
